DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine whether ear acupoint stimulation effective obese woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Auricular Point Stimulation Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: % change body weight , BMI , lipid profile , glucose obese hormone .
DOC.criteria: Age 1665 year woman BMI > 27 kg/mm Signed informed consent Endocrine disease , e.g . thyroid disorder , pituitary disorder , sex gland disorder . Heart disease , e.g . arrhythmia , heart failure , myocardial infarction , patient pacemaker . Allergy Immunology disease . High aminotransferase ( Alanine , Aspartate > 80 IU/L ) high serum creatinine ( > 2.5 mg/dL ) Pregnant lactate woman . Childbirth within 6 month . Stroke otherwise unable exercise Management weight control within 3 month . Any condition deem unsuitable trial evaluate physicianincharge . Endocrine disease
